title: Goodix introduces new Bluetooth LE and ToF solutions
content:
Technology is quite complicated. As a consumer, we rarely get to see all the bits and pieces that make a product work. In one device, it’s not uncommon to have tens or maybe hundreds of parts, sourced from different companies. Goodix Technology is a supplier of such parts, manufacturing optical under-display fingerprint scanners and audio

The post Goodix introduces new Bluetooth LE and ToF solutions appeared first on XDA.
description: Goodix Technology has announced new Bluetooth LE and ToF solutions during its showcase in China. The technology can be found in the upcoming Mi Band 7.
